## UnionToIntersection type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type UnionToIntersection<U> = (
  U extends any ? (k: U) => void : never
) extends (k: infer I) => void
  ? I
  : never
```

## Example


```ts
// Expect: { a: number } & { b: number }
type Props = UnionToIntersection<{ a: number } | { b: number }>
```
